name: Qytherial
description:
Not Currently a game as such but 

I have been working on it in my spare time. Currently in early stages but I hope to get the main game up an running as soon as I can.

Any Feedback is appreciated

Current Features

  • Basic Movement
  • Basic Inventory
  • Basic Items
  • Basic Menu System

Future Plans

  • Explore  planets
  • Fly through space
  • Follow the story

Note : Nothing In The current release is final and will probably change

An Intro Created By A Friend

We start in the galaxy of whocaresorsomething and humans are there. From humanland. Why? Because the writers were too lazy to come up with a planet and didn’t want to use earth, kinda like that one film with the guy who can’t breathe too good who does bad things to children with a magic sword that was really popular. so shut up.
